title: Ticket #5513: Improve Windows run_as_owner section
description:
Based on my mailing list thread earlier this week, I've written up some clarification to the run_as_owner section. I also made the pool password part of section 7.2.5 a subsubsection to make it stand out a little better as a distinct consideration. I won't be hurt if you don't like this (or if you decide it should be a subsection in its own right).

Patch incoming.
attachments:
• 0001-Add-more-content-to-the-windows-run_as_owner-section.patch 1378 bytes added by bcotton on 2016-Feb-11 23:03:28 UTC.
    The patch I promised you.
check_ins: 2016-Aug-18 16:59   Check-in [49045]: Gittrac #5513: Incorporated Ben's patch. (By Kent Wenger )
